text: Daughter has been schooling here for the last three years and has had a wonderful time! The teachers are kind and always helpful and really treat our little one very well. She loves coming to school!

The teachers, staff over here in CW are amazing. They are all very helpful and will listen to your needs and requirements readily.

My boys have definitely grown studying here and under their loving care.

Great centre to be in!

Agape Littlw Uni has been fantastic in educating my kid since he enrolled! I am pleased that he has managed to pick up a lot of social and motor skills which can be attributed to the education he has received! Communication with parents has also been quick and transparent!

Thank you to all the teachers at Agape Commonwealth!
Great place for kids to learn and grow. The staff are friendly, warm and kind, especially the front desk Ms Karen. The teachers very skilled in handling the kids.

Visited the centre recently and saw displays of childrenâ€™s art and craft put up. The staff that brought me around was very nice and informative for a first time parent like me. Convenience is a plus point!
